version_description:
iOS 9 resolution fix on iPhone 6 and 6 Plus.
Minor bug fixes.
Fix touch problems on iphone 6s and 6s Plus.

Fix a bug with Game Center authentication that sometimes causes the app to crash on startup.
Fix a bug with cross promotion link, now it will open the App Store as expected.
Minor bugs fixes.

Fix a bug with Game Center authentication that sometimes causes the app to crash on startup.
Fix a bug with cross promotion link, now it will open the App Store as expected.
Minor bugs fixes.

- Now you can play the game in 9 languages including: English, Spanish, French, Russian, German, Portuguese, Chinese, Japanese and Korean.
- Bug fixes and improvements

Small bug fixes and improvements.
